get.description: Lists all of the available REST API operations of the Microsoft.StorSimple provider

200.description: The collection of available provider operations.

get.description: Retrieves all the managers in a subscription.
Retrieves all the managers in a resource group.
Returns the properties of the specified manager name.

requestBody.description: The manager.

200.description: The StorSimple manager has been successfully updated

201.description: The StorSimple manager has been successfully created

200.description: The StorSimple manager has been successfully deleted

204.description: The StorSimple manager is already in a deleted state

requestBody.description: The manager update parameters.

200.description: The StorSimple manager has been successfully updated

get.description: Retrieves all the access control records in a manager.

200.description: The collection of access control records.

get.description: Returns the properties of the specified access control record name.

parameters.name: accessControlRecordName
parameters.description: Name of access control record to be fetched.

put.description: Creates or Updates an access control record.

parameters.name: accessControlRecordName
parameters.description: The name of the access control record.

requestBody.description: The access control record to be added or updated.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the access control record.

202.description: Accepted the request to create or update the access control record.

parameters.name: accessControlRecordName
parameters.description: The name of the access control record to delete.

202.description: Accepted the request to delete the access control record.

204.description: Successfully deleted the access control record.

get.description: Retrieves all the alerts in a manager.
Retrieves all the bandwidth setting in a manager.
Returns the properties of the specified bandwidth setting name.

parameters.name: bandwidthSettingName
parameters.description: The name of bandwidth setting to be fetched.

put.description: Creates or updates the bandwidth setting

requestBody.description: The bandwidth setting to be added or updated.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the bandwidth setting.

202.description: Accepted the request to create or update the bandwidth setting.

parameters.name: bandwidthSettingName
parameters.description: The name of the bandwidth setting.

202.description: Accepted the request to delete the bandwidth setting.

post.description: Clear the alerts.

requestBody.description: The clear alert request.

get.description: Lists supported cloud appliance models and supported configurations.

200.description: The collection of cloud appliance configuration.

post.description: Complete minimal setup before using the device.

requestBody.description: The minimal properties to configure a device.

202.description: Accepted the request to configure device.

get.description: Returns the list of devices for the specified manager.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Specify $expand=details to populate additional fields related to the device or $expand=rolloverdetails to populate additional fields related to the service data encryption key rollover on device

get.description: Returns the properties of the specified device.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Specify $expand=details to populate additional fields related to the device or $expand=rolloverdetails to populate additional fields related to the service data encryption key rollover on device

202.description: Accepted the request to delete the device.

requestBody.description: Patch representation of the device.

get.description: Gets the alert settings of the specified device.

put.description: Creates or updates the alert settings of the specified device.

requestBody.description: The alert settings to be added or updated.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the alert settings.

202.description: Accepted the request to create or update the alert settings.

post.description: Authorizes the specified device for service data encryption key rollover.

204.description: Successfully authorized the device for service encryption key rollover

get.description: Gets all the backup policies in a device.
Gets the properties of the specified backup policy name.

parameters.name: backupPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of backup policy to be fetched.

put.description: Creates or updates the backup policy.

parameters.name: backupPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the backup policy to be created/updated.

requestBody.description: The backup policy.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the backup policy.

202.description: Accepted the request to create or update the backup policy.

parameters.name: backupPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the backup policy.

202.description: Accepted the request to delete the backup policy.

post.description: Backup the backup policy now.

parameters.name: backupType
parameters.description: The backup Type. This can be cloudSnapshot or localSnapshot.

202.description: Accepted the request to backup the backup policy.

204.description: Successfully completed backup of the backup policy.

get.description: Gets all the backup schedules in a backup policy.
Gets the properties of the specified backup schedule name.

parameters.name: backupScheduleName
parameters.description: The name of the backup schedule to be fetched

put.description: Creates or updates the backup schedule.

requestBody.description: The backup schedule.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the backup schedule.

202.description: Accepted the request to create or update the backup schedule.
Accepted the request to delete the backup schedule.

get.description: Retrieves all the backups in a device.

202.description: Accepted the request to delete the backup.

post.description: Clones the backup element as a new volume.

requestBody.description: The clone request object.

202.description: Accepted the request to clone.

post.description: Restores the backup on the device.

202.description: Accepted the request to restore.

post.description: Deactivates the device.

202.description: Accepted the request to deactivate the device.

get.description: Lists the hardware component groups at device-level.

post.description: Changes the power state of the controller.

requestBody.description: The controller power state change request.

202.description: Accepted the request to change power state of the controller.

204.description: Successfully changed the power state of the controller.

post.description: Downloads and installs the updates on the device.

202.description: Accepted the request to download and install updates.

get.description: Gets all the jobs for specified device. With optional OData query parameters, a filtered set of jobs is returned.

200.description: The collection of jobs for the specified manager and device name.

get.description: Gets the details of the specified job name.

post.description: Cancels a job on the device.

202.description: Accepted the request to cancel a deviceJob

post.description: Returns all failover sets for a given device and their eligibility for participating in a failover. A failover set refers to a set of volume containers that need to be failed-over as a single unit to maintain data integrity.

200.description: Returns the list of failover sets on the given device.

get.description: Gets the metrics for the specified device.
Gets the metric definitions for the specified device.
Gets the network settings of the specified device.

patch.description: Updates the network settings on the specified device.

requestBody.description: The network settings to be updated.

202.description: Accepted the request to update network settings.

post.description: Returns the public encryption key of the device.
Scans for updates on the device.

202.description: Accepted the request to scan for updates.

get.description: Returns the Security properties of the specified device name.

patch.description: Patch Security properties of the specified device name.

requestBody.description: The security settings properties to be patched.

202.description: Accepted the request to update device security settings.

post.description: sync Remote management Certificate between appliance and Service

202.description: Accepted the request to sync Remote Management certificate settings.

204.description: Successfully synced Remote Management certificate settings.

post.description: Sends a test alert email.

requestBody.description: The send test alert email request.

get.description: Gets the time settings of the specified device.

put.description: Creates or updates the time settings of the specified device.

requestBody.description: The time settings to be added or updated.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the time settings.

202.description: Accepted the request to create or update the time settings.

get.description: Returns the update summary of the specified device name.
Gets all the volume containers in a device.
Gets the properties of the specified volume container name.

parameters.name: volumeContainerName
parameters.description: The name of the volume container.

put.description: Creates or updates the volume container.

parameters.name: volumeContainerName
parameters.description: The name of the volume container.

requestBody.description: The volume container to be added or updated.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the Volume Container.

202.description: Accepted the request to create or update the Volume Container

parameters.name: volumeContainerName
parameters.description: The name of the volume container.

202.description: Accepted the request to delete the Volume Container.

get.description: Gets the metrics for the specified volume container.
Gets the metric definitions for the specified volume container.
Retrieves all the volumes in a volume container.
Returns the properties of the specified volume name.

requestBody.description: Volume to be created or updated.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the volume.

202.description: Accepted the request to create or update the volume.
Accepted the request to create or update the volume.

get.description: Gets the metrics for the specified volume.
Gets the metric definitions for the specified volume.
Retrieves all the volumes in a device.

post.description: Failovers a set of volume containers from a specified source device to a target device.

parameters.name: sourceDeviceName
parameters.description: The source device name on which failover is performed.

requestBody.description: FailoverRequest containing the source device and the list of volume containers to be failed over.

202.description: Accepted the request to failover the device.

204.description: Successfully completed failover of the device.

post.description: Given a list of volume containers to be failed over from a source device, this method returns the eligibility result, as a failover target, for all devices under that resource.

parameters.name: sourceDeviceName
parameters.description: The source device name on which failover is performed.

requestBody.description: ListFailoverTargetsRequest containing the list of volume containers to be failed over.

200.description: The list of target devices and their eligibility for failover.

get.description: Returns the encryption settings of the manager.
Returns the extended information of the specified manager name.

put.description: Creates the extended info of the manager.

requestBody.description: The manager extended information.

200.description: The extended information on the manager has been successfully created

delete.description: Deletes the extended info of the manager.

204.description: The extended information on the manager has been successfully deleted

patch.description: Updates the extended info of the manager.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: Pass the ETag of ExtendedInfo fetched from GET call

requestBody.description: The manager extended information.

200.description: The extended information on the manager has been successfully created

get.description: Lists the features and their support status
Gets all the jobs for the specified manager. With optional OData query parameters, a filtered set of jobs is returned.

200.description: The collection of device jobs on all devices under the specified manager.

post.description: Returns the activation key of the manager.
Returns the symmetric encrypted public encryption key of the manager.

get.description: Gets the metrics for the specified manager.
Gets the metric definitions for the specified manager.

post.description: Provisions cloud appliance.

requestBody.description: The cloud appliance

200.description: Successfully created job for provision cloud appliance.

202.description: Accepted the request to provision cloud appliance.

post.description: Re-generates and returns the activation key of the manager.

get.description: Gets all the storage account credentials in a manager.

200.description: The collection of storage account credentials.

get.description: Gets the properties of the specified storage account credential name.

parameters.name: storageAccountCredentialName
parameters.description: The name of storage account credential to be fetched.

put.description: Creates or updates the storage account credential.

requestBody.description: The storage account credential to be added or updated.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the storage account credential.

202.description: Accepted the request to create or update the storage account credential.

parameters.name: storageAccountCredentialName
parameters.description: The name of the storage account credential.

204.description: Successfully deleted the storage account credential.

AccessControlRecordList.description: The collection of access control records.

volumeCount.description: The number of volumes using the access control record.

AccessControlRecordProperties.description: The properties of access control record.

AlertErrorDetails.description: The details of the error for which the alert was raised

appearedOnTime.description: Specifies the appeared time (in UTC) of the alerts to be filtered. Only 'Greater-Than' and 'Lesser-Than' operators are supported for this property.

severity.description: Specifies the severity of the alerts to be filtered. Only 'Equality' operator is supported for this property.

sourceName.description: Specifies the source name of the alerts to be filtered. Only 'Equality' operator is supported for this property.

sourceType.description: Specifies the source type of the alerts to be filtered. Only 'Equality' operator is supported for this property.

status.description: Specifies the status of the alerts to be filtered. Only 'Equality' operator is supported for this property.

AlertFilter.description: The OData filters to be used for Alert

nextLink.description: The URI of the next page of alerts.

emailNotification.description: Indicates whether email notification enabled or not.

notificationToServiceOwners.description: The value indicating whether alert notification enabled for admin or not.

AlertNotificationProperties.description: The properties of the alert notification settings.

appearedAtSourceTime.description: The source time at which the alert was raised

appearedAtTime.description: The UTC time at which the alert was raised

clearedAtSourceTime.description: The source time at which the alert was cleared

clearedAtTime.description: The UTC time at which the alert was cleared

recommendation.description: The recommended action for the issue raised in the alert

resolutionReason.description: The reason for resolving the alert

status.description: The current status of the alert

alertSourceType.description: The source type of the alert

timeZone.description: The time zone of the source

AlertSource.description: The source details at which the alert was raised

encryptionCertThumbprint.description: Thumbprint certificate that was used to encrypt "Value". If the value in unencrypted, it will be null.

AsymmetricEncryptedSecret.description: Represent the secrets intended for encryption with asymmetric key pair.

name.description: The name of the operation being performed on a particular object. Name format: "{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{read|write|delete|action}". Eg. Microsoft.StorSimple/managers/devices/volumeContainers/read, Microsoft.StorSimple/managers/devices/alerts/clearAlerts/action

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation; governs the display of the operation in the RBAC UX and the audit logs UX. Default value is "user,system"

description.description: The localized friendly description for the operation, as it should be shown to the user. It should be thorough, yet concise - it will be used in tool tips and detailed views.

operation.description: The localized friendly name for the operation, as it should be shown to the user. It should be concise (to fit in drop downs) but clear (i.e. self-documenting). It should use Title Casing and include the entity/resource to which it applies.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name - it is expected to also include the publisher/company responsible. It should use Title Casing and begin with 'Microsoft' for 1st party services.

resource.description: The localized friendly form of the resource type related to this action/operation - it should match the public documentation for the resource provider. It should use Title Casing - for examples, please refer to the 'name' section.

AvailableProviderOperationDisplay.description: Contains the localized display information for this particular operation/action. These value will be used by several clients for (a) custom role definitions for RBAC, (b) complex query filters for the event service and (c) audit history/records for management operations.

elementId.description: The path ID that uniquely identifies the backup element.

elementName.description: The name of the backup element.

elementType.description: The hierarchical type of the backup element.

volumeContainerId.description: The path ID of the volume container.

backupPolicyId.description: Specifies the backupPolicyId of the backups to be filtered. Only 'Equality' operator is supported for this property.

createdTime.description: Specifies the creation time of the backups to be filtered. Only 'Greater Than or Equal To' and 'Lesser Than or Equal To' operators are supported for this property.

volumeId.description: Specifies the volumeId of the backups to be filtered. Only 'Equality' operator is supported for this property.

BackupFilter.description: The OData filters to be used for backups.

backupPolicyCreationType.description: The backup policy creation type. Indicates whether this was created through SaaS or through StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

lastBackupTime.description: The time of the last backup for the backup policy.

nextBackupTime.description: The time of the next backup for the backup policy.

scheduledBackupStatus.description: Indicates whether at least one of the schedules in the backup policy is active or not.

schedulesCount.description: The count of schedules the backup policy contains.

ssmHostName.description: If the backup policy was created by StorSimple Snapshot Manager, then this field indicates the hostname of the StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

volumeIds.description: The path IDs of the volumes which are part of the backup policy.

BackupPolicyProperties.description: The properties of the backup policy.

backupPolicyId.description: The path ID of the backup policy.

createdOn.description: The time when the backup was created.

ssmHostName.description: The StorSimple Snapshot Manager host name.

backupType.description: The type of backup which needs to be taken.

lastSuccessfulRun.description: The last successful backup run which was triggered for the schedule.

retentionCount.description: The number of backups to be retained.

startTime.description: The start time of the schedule.

BackupScheduleProperties.description: The properties of the backup schedule.

volumeCount.description: The number of volumes that uses the bandwidth setting.

BandwidthRateSettingProperties.description: The properties of the bandwidth setting.

days.description: The days of the week when this schedule is applicable.

BandwidthSettingList.description: The collection of bandwidth setting entities.

id.description: The path ID that uniquely identifies the object.

kind.description: The Kind of the object. Currently only Series8000 is supported

type.description: The hierarchical type of the object.

BaseModel.description: Represents the base class for all other ARM object models

alerts.description: The list of alert IDs to be cleared

resolutionMessage.description: The resolution message while clearing the alert

ClearAlertRequest.description: The request for clearing the alert

targetAccessControlRecordIds.description: The list of path IDs of the access control records to be associated to the new cloned volume.

targetDeviceId.description: The path ID of the device which will act as the clone target.

targetVolumeName.description: The name of the new volume which will be created and the backup will be cloned into.

isVnetDnsConfigured.description: Indicates whether virtual network used is configured with DNS or not.

isVnetExpressConfigured.description: Indicates whether virtual network used is configured with express route or not.

storageAccountName.description: The name of the storage account.

storageAccountType.description: The type of the storage account.

vmImageName.description: The name of the virtual machine image.

vmType.description: The type of the virtual machine.

vnetName.description: The name of the virtual network.

CloudApplianceConfigurationProperties.description: The properties of cloud appliance configuration.

currentDeviceName.description: The current name of the device.

friendlyName.description: The friendly name for the device.

timeZone.description: The device time zone. For eg: "Pacific Standard Time"

ConfigureDeviceRequestProperties.description: The properties of the configure device request.

ControllerPowerStateChangeRequest.description: The controller power state change request.

action.description: The power state that the request is expecting for the controller of the device.

activeController.description: The active controller that the request is expecting on the device.

controller0State.description: The controller 0's status that the request is expecting on the device.

controller1State.description: The controller 1's status that the request is expecting on the device.

ControllerPowerStateChangeRequestPropert.description: The properties of the controller power state change request.

primaryDnsServer.description: The primary IPv4 DNS server for the device

primaryIpv6DnsServer.description: The primary IPv6 DNS server for the device

secondaryDnsServers.description: The secondary IPv4 DNS server for the device

secondaryIpv6DnsServers.description: The secondary IPv6 DNS server for the device

DNSSettings.description: The DNS(Domain Name Server) settings of a device.

cloudData.description: The number of bytes of data written to cloud, as part of the job.

processedData.description: The number of bytes of data processed till now, as part of the job.

throughput.description: The average throughput of data processed(bytes/sec), as part of the job.

totalData.description: The total bytes of data to be processed, as part of the job.

DataStatistics.description: The additional details related to the data related statistics of a job. Currently applicable only for Backup, Clone and Restore jobs.

endpointCount.description: The total number of endpoints that are currently on the device ( i.e. number of volumes).

volumeContainerCount.description: The total number of volume containers on the device.

DeviceDetails.description: The additional device details regarding the end point count and volume container count.

deviceDescription.description: Short description given for the device

DevicePatchProperties.description: The properties of the device patch.

activationTime.description: The UTC time at which the device was activated

activeController.description: The identifier of the active controller of the device.

availableLocalStorageInBytes.description: The storage in bytes that is available locally on the device.

availableTieredStorageInBytes.description: The storage in bytes that is available on the device for tiered volumes.

culture.description: The language culture setting on the device. For eg: "en-US"

deviceConfigurationStatus.description: The current configuration status of the device.

deviceLocation.description: The location of the virtual appliance.

deviceSoftwareVersion.description: The version number of the software running on the device.

friendlyName.description: The friendly name of the device.

friendlySoftwareName.description: The friendly name of the software running on the device.

networkInterfaceCardCount.description: The number of network interface cards

provisionedLocalStorageInBytes.description: The storage in bytes used for locally pinned volumes on the device (including additional local reservation).

provisionedTieredStorageInBytes.description: The storage in bytes that has been provisioned on the device for tiered volumes.

provisionedVolumeSizeInBytes.description: Total capacity in bytes of tiered and locally pinned volumes on the device

status.description: The current status of the device.

totalTieredStorageInBytes.description: The total tiered storage available on the device in bytes.

usingStorageInBytes.description: The storage in bytes that is currently being used on the device, including both local and cloud.

DeviceProperties.description: The properties of the StorSimple device.

authorizationEligibility.description: The eligibility status of device for service data encryption key rollover.

authorizationStatus.description: The authorization status of the device for service data encryption key rollover.

inEligibilityReason.description: The reason for inEligibility of device, in case it's not eligible for service data encryption key rollover.

DeviceRolloverDetails.description: The additional device details for the service data encryption key rollover.

name.description: Specifies the dimension name. E.g., NetworkInterface. Valid values are the ones specified in the field "dimensions" in the ListMetricDefinitions call. Only 'Equality' operator is supported for this property.

values.description: Specifies the dimension value. E.g., Data0. Valid values are the ones returned in the field "dimensions" in the ListMetricDefinitions call. Only 'Equality' operator is supported for this property.

encryptionStatus.description: The encryption status to indicates if encryption is enabled or not.

keyRolloverStatus.description: The key rollover status to indicates if key rollover is required or not. If secret's encryption has been upgraded, then it requires key rollover.

targetDeviceId.description: The ARM path ID of the device which will act as the failover target.

volumeContainers.description: The list of path IDs of the volume containers which needs to be failed-over to the target device.

FailoverRequest.description: The request object for triggering a failover of volume containers, from a source device to a target device.

volumeContainers.description: The list of meta data of volume containers, which are part of the failover set.

FailoverSet.description: The failover set on a device.

errorMessage.description: The error message, if the failover set is not eligible for failover.

isEligibleForFailover.description: Represents if this failover set is eligible for failover or not.

FailoverSetEligibilityResult.description: The eligibility result of failover set, for failover.

availableLocalStorageInBytes.description: The amount of free local storage available on the device in bytes.

availableTieredStorageInBytes.description: The amount of free tiered storage available for the device in bytes.

dataContainersCount.description: The count of data containers on the device.

deviceId.description: The path ID of the device.

deviceLocation.description: The geo location (applicable only for cloud appliances) of the device.

deviceSoftwareVersion.description: The software version of the device.

friendlyDeviceSoftwareVersion.description: The friendly name for the current version of software on the device.

modelDescription.description: The model number of the device.

volumesCount.description: The count of volumes on the device.

FailoverTarget.description: Represents the eligibility of a device as a failover target device.

value.description: The list of all the failover targets.

FailoverTargetsList.description: The list of all devices in a resource and their eligibility status as a failover target device.

deviceId.description: Specifies the device ID for which the features are required. Only 'Equality' operator is supported for this property.

FeatureFilter.description: The OData filter to be used for features.

displayName.description: The display name of the hardware component.

status.description: The status of the hardware component.

statusDisplayName.description: The display name of the status of hardware component.

HardwareComponentGroupList.description: The collection of hardware component groups.

displayName.description: The display name the hardware component group.

HardwareComponentGroupProperties.description: The properties of hardware component group.

endTime.description: The UTC time at which the job completed.

percentComplete.description: The percentage of the job that is already complete.

startTime.description: The UTC time at which the job was started.

status.description: The current status of the job.

code.description: The error code intended for programmatic access.

message.description: The error message intended to describe the error in detail.

JobErrorDetails.description: The job error details. Contains list of job error items.

code.description: The error code intended for programmatic access.

message.description: The error message intended to describe the error in detail.

jobType.description: Specifies the type of the jobs to be filtered. For e.g., "ScheduledBackup", "ManualBackup", "RestoreBackup", "CloneVolume", "FailoverVolumeContainers", "CreateLocallyPinnedVolume", "ModifyVolume", "InstallUpdates", "SupportPackageLogs", or "CreateCloudAppliance". Only 'Equality' operator can be used for this property.

startTime.description: Specifies the start time of the jobs to be filtered.  Only 'Greater Than or Equal To' and 'Lesser Than or Equal To' operators are supported for this property.

status.description: Specifies the status of the jobs to be filtered. For e.g., "Running", "Succeeded", "Failed" or "Canceled". Only 'Equality' operator is supported for this property.

JobFilter.description: The OData filter to be used for jobs.

backupPointInTime.description: The time of the backup used for the failover.

backupType.description: The backup type (CloudSnapshot | LocalSnapshot). Applicable only for backup jobs.

deviceId.description: The device ID in which the job ran.

entityLabel.description: The entity identifier for which the job ran.

entityType.description: The entity type for which the job ran.

isCancellable.description: Represents whether the job is cancellable or not.

sourceDeviceId.description: The source device ID of the failover job.

errorCode.description: The error code of the stage if any.

message.description: The message of the job stage.

JobStage.description: The details about the specific stage of a job.

activationKey.description: The activation key for the device.

volumeContainers.description: The list of path IDs of the volume containers that needs to be failed-over, for which we want to fetch the eligible targets.

ListFailoverTargetsRequest.description: The request object for fetching the list of failover targets (eligible devices for failover).

ManagerExtendedInfo.description: The extended info of the manager.

algorithm.description: Represents the encryption algorithm used to encrypt the keys. None - if Key is saved in plain text format. Algorithm name - if key is encrypted

encryptionKey.description: Represents the CEK of the resource.

encryptionKeyThumbprint.description: Represents the Cert thumbprint that was used to encrypt the CEK.

integrityKey.description: Represents the CIK of the resource.

portalCertificateThumbprint.description: Represents the portal thumbprint which can be used optionally to encrypt the entire data before storing it.

version.description: The version of the extended info being persisted.

ManagerExtendedInfoProperties.description: The properties of the manager extended info.

ManagerIntrinsicSettings.description: Intrinsic settings which refers to the type of the StorSimple Manager.

tags.description: The tags attached to the Manager.

provisioningState.description: Specifies the state of the resource as it is getting provisioned. Value of "Succeeded" means the Manager was successfully created.

ManagerProperties.description: The properties of the StorSimple Manager.

name.description: Refers to the sku name which should be "Standard"

retention.description: The retention period for the metric at the specified timegrain.

timeGrain.description: The aggregation interval for the metric.

average.description: The average of all samples at the time stamp.

count.description: The count of all samples at the time stamp.

maximum.description: The maximum of all samples at the time stamp.

minimum.description: The minimum of all samples at the time stamp.

sum.description: The sum of all samples at the time stamp.

timeStamp.description: The time stamp of the metric data.

MetricDimension.description: The metric dimension. It indicates the source of the metric.

category.description: Specifies the category of the metrics to be filtered. E.g., "CapacityUtilization". Valid values are the ones returned as the field "category" in the ListMetricDefinitions call. Only 'Equality' operator is supported for this property.

endTime.description: Specifies the end time of the time range to be queried. Only 'Less Than Or Equal To' operator is supported for this property.

startTime.description: Specifies the start time of the time range to be queried. Only 'Greater Than Or Equal To' operator is supported for this property.

timeGrain.description: Specifies the time granularity of the metrics to be returned. E.g., "P1D". Valid values are the ones returned as the field "timeGrain" in the ListMetricDefinitions call. Only 'Equality' operator is supported for this property.

MetricFilter.description: The OData filters to be used for metrics.

value.description: Specifies the metric name to be filtered on. E.g., CloudStorageUsed. Valid values are the ones returned in the field "name" in the ListMetricDefinitions call. Only 'Equality' operator is supported for this property.

MetricNameFilter.description: The metric name filter, specifying the name of the metric to be filtered on.

endTime.description: The end time of the metric data.

startTime.description: The start time of the metric data.

timeGrain.description: The time granularity of the metric data.

type.description: The type of the metric data.

unit.description: The unit of the metric data.

values.description: The list of the metric data.

NetworkAdapterList.description: The collection of network adapters on the device.

interfaceId.description: The ID of the network adapter.

isDefault.description: Value indicating whether this instance is default.

iscsiAndCloudStatus.description: Value indicating cloud and ISCSI status of network adapter.

mode.description: The mode of network adapter, either IPv4, IPv6 or both.

netInterfaceStatus.description: Value indicating status of network adapter.

speed.description: The speed of the network adapter.

NetworkAdapters.description: Represents the network adapter on device.

NetworkSettings.description: Represents the network settings of a device.

NetworkSettingsPatch.description: Represents the patch request for the network settings of a device.

NetworkSettingsPatchProperties.description: The properties of the network settings patch.

NetworkSettingsProperties.description: The properties of the network settings of device.

ipv4Address.description: The IPv4 address of the network adapter.

ipv4Gateway.description: The IPv4 gateway of the network adapter.

ipv4Netmask.description: The IPv4 netmask of the network adapter.

NicIPv4.description: Details related to the IPv4 address configuration.

ipv6Address.description: The IPv6 address of the network adapter.

ipv6Gateway.description: The IPv6 gateway of the network adapter.

ipv6Prefix.description: The IPv6 prefix of the network adapter.

NicIPv6.description: Details related to the IPv6 address configuration.

RemoteManagementSettings.description: The settings for remote management of a device.

RemoteManagementSettingsPatch.description: The settings for updating remote management mode of the device.

location.description: The geo location of the resource.

tags.description: The tags attached to the resource.

weeklyDaysList.description: The week days list. Applicable only for schedules of recurrence type 'weekly'.

secondaryDnsServers.description: The list of secondary DNS Server IP addresses.

SecuritySettings.description: The security settings of a device.

SecuritySettingsPatch.description: Represents the patch request for the security settings of a device.

SecuritySettingsPatchProperties.description: The properties of the security settings patch.

SecuritySettingsProperties.description: The properties of security settings of a device.

emailList.description: The list of email IDs to send the test alert email

SendTestAlertEmailRequest.description: The request for sending test alert email

StorageAccountCredentialList.description: The collection of storage account credential entities.

sslStatus.description: Signifies whether SSL needs to be enabled or not.

volumesCount.description: The count of volumes using this storage account credential.

encryptionAlgorithm.description: The algorithm used to encrypt the "Value".

value.description: The value of the secret itself. If the secret is in plaintext or null then EncryptionAlgorithm will be none.

valueCertificateThumbprint.description: The thumbprint of the cert that was used to encrypt "Value".

SymmetricEncryptedSecret.description: Represents the secrets encrypted using Symmetric Encryption Key.

message.description: The localized error message stating the reason why the device is not eligible as a target device.

resolution.description: The localized resolution message for the error.

resultCode.description: The result code for the error, due to which the device does not qualify as a failover target device.

TargetEligibilityErrorMessage.description: The error/warning message due to which the device is ineligible as a failover target device.

eligibilityStatus.description: The eligibility status of device, as a failover target device.

messages.description: The list of error messages, if a device does not qualify as a failover target device.

TargetEligibilityResult.description: The eligibility result of device, as a failover target device.

TimeSettings.description: The time settings of a device.

primaryTimeServer.description: The primary Network Time Protocol (NTP) server name, like 'time.windows.com'.

secondaryTimeServer.description: The secondary Network Time Protocol (NTP) server name, like 'time.contoso.com'. It's optional.

timeZone.description: The timezone of device, like '(UTC -06:00) Central America'

TimeSettingsProperties.description: The properties of time settings of a device.

Updates.description: The updates profile of a device.

isUpdateInProgress.description: Indicates whether an update is in progress or not.

lastUpdatedTime.description: The time when the last update was completed.

maintenanceModeUpdatesAvailable.description: Set to 'true' if maintenance mode update available.

regularUpdatesAvailable.description: Set to 'true' if regular updates are available for the device.

UpdatesProperties.description: The properties of the updates profile.

volumeContainerId.description: The path ID of the volume container.

volumes.description: The list of metadata of volumes inside the volume container, which contains valid cloud snapshots.

VolumeContainerFailoverMetadata.description: The metadata of the volume container, that is being considered as part of a failover set.

VolumeContainerList.description: The collection of volume container entities.

bandWidthRateInMbps.description: The bandwidth-rate set on the volume container.

bandwidthSettingId.description: The ID of the bandwidth setting associated with the volume container.

encryptionStatus.description: The flag to denote whether encryption is enabled or not.

ownerShipStatus.description: The owner ship status of the volume container. Only when the status is "NotOwned", the delete operation on the volume container is permitted.

storageAccountCredentialId.description: The path ID of storage account associated with the volume container.

totalCloudStorageUsageInBytes.description: The total cloud storage for the volume container.

volumeCount.description: The number of volumes in the volume Container.

backupCreatedDate.description: The date at which the snapshot was taken.

backupElementId.description: The path ID of the backup-element for this volume, inside the backup set.

backupId.description: The path ID of the backup set.

backupPolicyId.description: The path ID of the backup policy using which the snapshot was taken.

sizeInBytes.description: The size of the volume in bytes at the time the snapshot was taken.

volumeId.description: The path ID of the volume.

VolumeFailoverMetadata.description: The metadata of a volume that has valid cloud snapshot.

accessControlRecordIds.description: The IDs of the access control records, associated with the volume.

backupPolicyIds.description: The IDs of the backup policies, in which this volume is part of.

backupStatus.description: The backup status of the volume.

monitoringStatus.description: The monitoring status of the volume.

operationStatus.description: The operation status on the volume.

sizeInBytes.description: The size of the volume in bytes.

volumeContainerId.description: The ID of the volume container, in which this volume is created.

WebproxySettings.description: The web proxy settings on the device.
